i love this place.  a couple of my friends had been here before and insisted that we all go together.  they knew what they were doing, so i just followed along.  find a spot at the bar, order a round of cava and some nibbles.  i believe you have to order some food w/ each round of drinks.  nibbles come in 3 food groups:  carbs (bread), meat (in all shapes and forms), and dairy (cheese).  we ordered up on a bunch of jamon, cheese, sausage, and bocadillos.  in about 2 hours, 5 of us only racked up a bill of 56 euros.  amazing!!!it gets super packed, but it makes for a great time!
